play

public static int play( Mix_Chunk* effect, int loopCount, ChannelListener* listener = 0 );
play the loaded sound effect on the next available channel
Parameters:
effect - - the effect to play
loopCount - - the number of times to loop playback (0 means play the sound once, 1 means loop once, playing twice)
Returns:
the channel used
